resources.string: You get one point for each ace in your hand.
You get two points for each two in your hand.
You get three points for each three in your hand.
You get four points for each four in your hand.
You get five points for each five in your hand.
You get six points for each six in your hand.
If you score 63 or more points in this section you get 35 bonus points. One way to do this is to get at least three of a kind in each section
Your entire hand is scored if you have at least three of a kind.
Your entire hand is scored if you have at least four of a kind.
You get 25 points for a double and triple in the same hand.
You get 30 points for a straight of at least 4, such as 2 3 4 5.
You get 40 points for a straight of five, such as 1 2 3 4 5.
You get 50 points for five of a kind.
